description:
An ideal tool for browsing and controlling BACnet devices, performing a variety of useful functions; built-in BACnet device simulator.


- Support object access services, read and write data attributes, create and delete objects.
- Support alarm and event services, support COV reports, subscribe and receive messages, view data changes in real time in the form of charts, and support exporting historical data.
- Support file access services, upload and download files.
- Support rich remote device management services, including: device communication control, device initialization control, time synchronization, etc.
- Display object models in a hierarchical structure, and display description text and data types as defined by the standard.
- BACnet client and server.
- Open multiple connections at the same time.
- Support Windows, macOS and Linux.
- Perfect and user-friendly interface design brings you a smooth operation experience.
